meanings.definition: A game played on a square board with pockets at each corner, in which players use a striker to knock their own and their opponent's pieces into the pockets.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we enjoyed a fun game of carroms.
meanings.sent2: Let's set up the carroms board and start playing.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play carroms with the balls on the pool table.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room as she skillfully played carroms.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the carroms pieces hitting the pockets was music to their ears.

meanings.definition: To play the game of carroms.
meanings.sent1: We often carroms together on lazy Sunday afternoons.
meanings.sent2: He carroms with his friends every weekend.
meanings.sent3: She carroms so enthusiastically that the pieces sometimes fly off the board.
meanings.sent4: The children's laughter filled the room as they carromed happily.
meanings.sent5: Carroming requires skill and precision to win the game.
